goals__remit: bxl-law was set up in September 2010 as a law firm advising clients on food and farm, retail and consumer law. It has extended its scope of activity to become a full service EU affairs consultancy that also offers association management services and advice on 'Lisbon Comitology' specifically the use of delegated acts and implementing acts and the important role these legal instruments play in shaping the regulatory environment faced by EU industry. It is an SME consultancy for SME clients.
